prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant green body and striking red wings.
I want a flying Pokemon that showcases intricate wing patterns and agile movements.
Generate a Pokemon that blends in with forest environments, featuring camouflage colors.
Make an insectoid creature with a fierce appearance and agile flight abilities.
Imagine a Pokemon with a mix of green and red colors that thrives in grasslands.
Design a Pokemon known for its speed and agility, with an elongated body and large wings.
Give me a visually stunning bug Pokemon that can navigate urban landscapes effortlessly.
